content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello, Emilia. I'm glad you're interested in the apartment. It's a very attractive property in the city center, close to all amenities. What is your initial offer for the monthly rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I believe the market value for a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center is around 800 Euro per month. Would you be willing to start at that price?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but I'm looking to get the highest possible price for my apartment. 800 Euro per month is not reflective of the true value of this property. I'm sure we can find a price that is more fair and reflects the desirability of the location and the quality of the building. Would you be willing to consider a higher offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you're looking to get the best price for your apartment, and I appreciate the quality and location of the property. However, as a student, I have to be mindful of my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate a price closer to the market value, perhaps around 750 Euro per month? This would still be a fair offer considering the current market conditions.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: As a landlord, I have to ensure that the rent reflects the true value of the property. 750 Euro per month is still below what I believe the apartment is worth. I'm willing to negotiate, but I'm looking for a price that adequately compensates me for the investment I've made in this prime location. Would you be willing to come up to, say, 850 Euro per month? This would be more in line with what I'm seeking.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While 850 Euro per month is closer to the market value, it's slightly outside of my budget as a student. Would it be possible to find a middle ground, perhaps around 800 Euro per month? This would be a fair compromise that reflects the quality of the apartment and is also within my financial capabilities.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, I understand that you're a student and have budget constraints. However, I must stress that the location and quality of this apartment are exceptional. 800 Euro per month is, once again, below what I believe this property is worth. I'm willing to be flexible, but I'm looking for a price that reflects the true value of the apartment. How about 825 Euro per month? This is a fair offer that takes into account your situation while also being reasonable for the market.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for considering my budget as a student. Your offer of 825 Euro per month is closer to my price range. I appreciate the effort you're making to reach a fair agreement. Would it be possible to discuss any potential discounts for long-term contracts or any other ways to reduce the overall cost?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: As a landlord, I typically prefer long-term contracts for the stability they provide. However, I'm willing to negotiate on the terms of the lease if it helps us reach an agreement. Would you be interested in a two-year contract with a fixed rent of 825 Euro per month? This would provide you with some security in your living situation, and it would give me the long-term tenant I'm looking for.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: A two-year contract with a fixed rent of 825 Euro per month could be a good solution for me. It would help me plan my expenses as a student, and I would appreciate the stability of knowing I have a home for the next two years. If you're willing to agree to this arrangement, I would be happy to sign the lease.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Excellent, Emilia. I'm glad we've found a solution that works for both of us. We have a deal on the two-year contract with a fixed rent of 825 Euro per month. I'll draft the lease agreement and we can meet to sign it. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
